oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Job Corps name change honors Dr. Benjamin Hooks"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hooks, Benjamin L.; Memphis Job Corps; 2000s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Hundreds of community supporters, well-wishers, and elected officials converged on the campus of Memphis Job Corps for a historic and momentous ceremony to honor Dr. Benjamin L. Hooks by renaming the South Memphis center after him."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mitchell, Dr. Sybil C.
